title: Instructor Collaboration Workshops for Effective Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: No or limited online education experience
context.additional_context: Short intensive course measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments for current practitioners

learning_goals: Using instructional design meeting structuring techniques, learners can propose effective collaboration strategies with instructors.
Learners can explain core elements to consider in online learning design (pedagogy, andragogy principles, learning experience design).
Based on real-world cases, learners can draft learner-centered online course designs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
